SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class Table

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.SceneController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.Table
public class Table extends SceneController
Controller class representing the game table in the GUI. Manages UI components and interactions for displaying game state. Extends SceneController.
